source: .toggle-container[data-astro-cid-djbti2nt]{margin:0.75rem 0;border-radius:8px;background:var(--color-surface);overflow:hidden}.toggle-header[data-astro-cid-djbti2nt]{display:flex;align-items:center;gap:0.5rem;padding:0.75rem 1rem;width:100%;background:none;border:none;color:inherit;font-family:inherit;font-size:inherit;cursor:pointer;text-align:left;outline:none;-webkit-tap-highlight-color:transparent}.toggle-icon[data-astro-cid-djbti2nt]{width:0;height:0;border-left:6px solid var(--color-text);border-top:5px solid transparent;border-bottom:5px solid transparent;transition:transform 0.3s ease;flex-shrink:0}.toggle-container[data-astro-cid-djbti2nt][data-open=true] .toggle-icon[data-astro-cid-djbti2nt]{transform:rotate(90deg)}.toggle-title[data-astro-cid-djbti2nt]{flex:1;font-weight:500}.toggle-wrapper[data-astro-cid-djbti2nt]{display:grid;grid-template-rows:0fr;transition:grid-template-rows 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4,0,0.2,1)}.toggle-container[data-astro-cid-djbti2nt][data-open=true] .toggle-wrapper[data-astro-cid-djbti2nt]{grid-template-rows:1fr}.toggle-inner[data-astro-cid-djbti2nt]{overflow:hidden}.toggle-content[data-astro-cid-djbti2nt]{padding:0 1rem 1rem 1.75rem;color:var(--color-text-muted);min-height:0}.toggle-content[data-astro-cid-djbti2nt] p:last-child{margin-bottom:0}@media (pointer: coarse){.toggle-header[data-astro-cid-djbti2nt]{padding:1rem;min-height:48px}}
